channel.name: S4C UK
channel.title: Newyddion S4C
channel.desc: Newyddion S4C a'r Tywydd. S4C News and Weather.

channel.name: S4C UK
channel.title: SEICLO
channel.desc: C10. Bydd gorffeniad pen mynydd Puy de Sancy yn cynnig her gyntaf i ffefrynnau'r ras am felyn. S10. A summit finish at Puy de Sancy offers the first true test for yellow jersey hopefuls.

channel.name: S4C UK
channel.title: Olobobs
channel.desc: Mae Anlwc yn dilyn Tib heddiw gan greu pob math o helbul i Tib. Tib is being followed by Bad Luck - until Gigglegoon comes along and brightens their day.

channel.name: S4C UK
channel.title: Pablo
channel.desc: Tra'n yr archfarchnad heddiw nid yw Pablo'n gallu penderfynu pa fath o basta mae o eisiau i de. Ond mae'n rhaid iddo ddewis un ohonynt. Pablo can't decide what type of pasta to have for tea.

channel.name: S4C UK
channel.title: Kim a C?t a Twrch
channel.desc: Ymunwch ? Kim a C?t ar antur hudolus a chwareus sy'n llawn dawns a cherddoriaeth wrth iddyn nhw chwilio am Twrch yn y goedwig. Join Kim and C?t on a magical and playful adventure.

channel.name: S4C UK
channel.title: Siwrne Ni
channel.desc: Y tro 'ma, mae Emrys, sydd wrth ei fodd yn y dwr, ar ei ffordd i ganwio yn Llandysul. This time, Emrys, who loves the water, is venturing to Llandysul to go canoeing.

channel.name: S4C UK
channel.title: LEGO ? Ffrindiau
channel.desc: Mae'r merched dal yn erlid Pransky, yr arist graffiti, ac mae'r erlid yn eu harwain i'r goedwig. An attempt to catch a graffiti artist leads to a forest fire in the woods.

channel.name: S4C UK
channel.title: Tekkers
channel.desc: Y capteiniaid Heledd Anna, Lloyd Lewis a Huw Owen sy'n herio dau d?m newydd i brofi eu Tekkers p?l-droed. Ysgol Bro Caereinion and Ysgol y Bannau are this week's teams going head to head.

channel.name: S4C UK
channel.title: Newyddion Ni
channel.desc: Newyddion i bobl ifanc. News programmes for youngsters.

channel.name: S4C UK
channel.title: Y S?n
channel.desc: Yn y bennod yma, byddwn yn cyfarfod cynllunydd theatr dawnus, ac yn dysgu am ddrymiau ym Mhont-y-clun. Today, we learn about the history of zines, and take a walk around Merthyr Tydfil.

channel.name: S4C UK
channel.title: Rownd a Rownd
channel.desc: Mae Anna wedi cyrraedd pen ei thennyn. Mae hi mewn trafferthion mawr ac wyr hi ddim beth i'w wneud. When Mair, Beca and Ioan discover what Anna is planning, they decide to tell Elen.

channel.name: S4C UK
channel.title: Heno
channel.desc: Rhaglen gylchgrawn nosweithiol gyda straeon o bob cwr o Gymru. Nightly magazine with stories from all over Wales and special guests.

channel.name: S4C UK
channel.title: Newyddion S4C
channel.desc: Newyddion S4C a'r Tywydd. S4C News and Weather.

channel.name: S4C UK
channel.title: Y Byd ar Bedwar
channel.desc: Cyfres materion cyfoes gyda straeon o Gymru a'r byd. Current affairs series with stories from around Wales and the world.

channel.name: S4C UK
channel.title: Garddio a Mwy
channel.desc: Cawn ymweliad ? Menter Bwyd Sir Gar gyda Adam, a Meinir sy'n plannu bylbiau i gael toreth o liw Hydrefol. This week Sioned seeks advice about how to look after the grapevines at Pont y Twr.

channel.name: S4C UK
channel.title: Newyddion S4C
channel.desc: Newyddion S4C a'r Tywydd. S4C News and Weather.

channel.name: S4C UK
channel.title: Cefn Gwlad
channel.desc: Cwrddwn ? Llysgennad y Sioe Fawr eleni, Rhys Griffith - ffarmwr ifanc, dyn busnes a bridiwr ceffylau. We meet young farmer and businessman Rhys - 2025's Royal Welsh Ambassador.

channel.name: S4C UK
channel.title: SEICLO
channel.desc: Cymal 10 - Uchafbwyntiau'r dydd o'r Tour de France. Stage 10 - The day's highlights from the Tour de France.

channel.name: S4C UK
channel.title: It's My Shout
channel.desc: Rhaglen ddogfen yn dathlu angerdd ffyrnig a chyfeillgarwch band o ferched Cymraeg, i gyd dros 50 oed. Documentary celebrating the passion and camaraderie of an over-50 Welsh women's band.

channel.name: S4C UK
channel.title: Gronyn Gobaith
channel.desc: Stori ryfeddol arbrawf mwya'r byd yn CERN, lle mae ffisegwyr o Gymru yn allweddol. The remarkable story of the biggest physics experiment in the world, where Welsh scientists are key.
